abstract: After joining the airforce in 1942 Cliff would spend the majority of his service running missions on boats. Lucky he didn't tell them he couldn't swim.
description: Cliff's father was a fisherman, so he knew about boats. After joining the airforce in 1942 he would spend the majority of his service running missions on boats. Lucky he didn't tell them he couldn't swim.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002738; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans; Active; 2011
